name: Galactic Control
description:
How to Play

Left Click: Shoot and Move (a mouse is recommended)

Move cursor to rotate / aim the ship

Space: Pause game

Q: Quit game

Esc: Free cursor (click on game window to confine cursor again)

Description

The only way to control your ship is by shooting! Move in the opposite direction you shoot as you battle endless waves of enemies. Each wave the speed of both you and your enemies increase. The faster you become, the harder it is to control your ship!

Features

Enemies


Chases after the player's ship and damages the player on collision.                          
Weak individually, but can overwhelm the player 
with numbers.A laser that blocks off an entire section of the screen.
Has a wind up period before it can cause damage.Shoots at the player from range and has a lot of health.
Take these out as soon as possible.

Powerups

Health: Grants one full heart recovery.                                     Insta-Kill: Enemies are destroyed in one hit.                                                  Invincibility: Take no damage and destroy enemies on collision.Supercharged: Automatically shoot from three sides of your ship.
